page.title: 08PARISH COUNCIL: DANE END
page.content: {CHAIRMAN, LITTLE MUNDEN PARISH {COUNCIL:}Mrs. Pat Hibberd was born in Hertfordshire and prefers to live in a village rather than a town. She became interested in local affairs after joining the Women's Institute and was asked to become a parish councillor and this led her into being elected to the District Council. Mrs. Hibberd does not stand for a political party as she feels politics should not enter into local affairs. She deals with housing repair problems, rehousing, gives advice on form-filling and understanding of official letters; she deals with complaints about roads and footpaths and road signs.{PLANNING APPLICATIONS{ are looked at carefully in small communities to prevent over development.This year the Council has planted many{trees}in Dane End.
